notEnoughETH.title: Not enough funds to enter the game

text.part1: You don't have enough balance in your wallet. In order to participate in the lottery, you need to have at least {{fee}} ETH in your balance. Please make a deposit.
text.part2: Explainer: Participation in lottery requires a transaction on-chain on Ethereum network. Every on-chain transaction requires a fee, in our case {{fee}} ETH. This is because we want to ensure every participation is transparent and visible directly on Ethereum network. We are working very hard to make this fee as low as possible.

trustworthy.title: Trustworthy

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.text:
Thanks to blockchain technology and using cryptocurrencies for lottery entry, Loteo is 100% transparent and all transaction as well as prize splits can be viewed at all times, instead of traditional lotteries, where you don't know number of attendees, prize amount, nor even if its fair nor manipulated,
as there is central authority.

winnerEveryDrawing.title: Winner every drawing
winnerEveryDrawing.text: Not like in lotto, where you need to tip right combination of numbers and the winner is once/year.

biggestSliceForTheWinner.title: Biggest slice for the winner
biggestSliceForTheWinner.text: Loteo feels a strong need to provide the best user experience, that our customer, especially non crypto familiar are used for, thats why there will be integration of credit card payments as well as mobile message payments.

speed.title: Speed
speed.text: Thanks to blockchain technology and cryptocurrency usage Loteo is incomparably faster than traditional lotteries.

howItWorks.helmet: How it works | LOTEO - Transparent Blockchain Lottery
howItWorks.title: How it works

loteoSolutionSection.p1: LOTEO is a fully automated lottery platform that uses blockchain and smart contracts to create a fully transparent and trustworthy lottery, where your chances are incomparably higher compared to conventional lotteries. There are several problems with ”classic” style lotteries, that we’ve addressed with LOTEO.
loteoSolutionSection.p2: By being governed by smart contracts rather than governments or private individuals, the drawing process becomes automated and trustworthy.
loteoSolutionSection.p3: All transactions and prizes are viewable on the blockchain at all times.
loteoSolutionSection.p4: Unlike conventional lotteries in which you bet against an unknown number of drawn numbers, in LOTEO you only bet against other purchased tickets, an amount that is several thousand times smaller than the number of potential winning combinations in standard lotteries.
loteoSolutionSection.p5: Thanks to the blockchain, the system is transparent and you can track all transactions. You have a chance to win everytime the lottery takes place as you are only betting against a certain number of participants.
loteoSolutionSection.p6: There are many problems with current blockchain-based digital gambling platforms. They are often too complicated, suited only for crypto enthusiasts, offering an unsophisticated design that is neither attractive nor user friendly.

infoSection.p1: Users enter the lottery by purchasing single tickets for the LOTEO weekly lottery using the Ethereum cryptocurrency or through a third party merchant. Each Ethereum wallet address that has purchased entry is then registered as a participant in the LOTEO weekly lottery. At a later date, LOTEO will add a daily lottery governed by the same rules.
infoSection.p2: The LOTEO lottery will be executed through a smart contract that will utilize a random number generator (RNG). The pool for drawing consists only of lottery tickets (based on the Ethereum addresses of the entrees) instead of drawing random numbers, therefore every drawing must have a winner.
infoSection.p3: After the winner of the lottery is selected, a smart contract will send the prize automatically to the appropriate Ethereum address(es). The prize will split in the following way:
infoSection.p4: In order to gain the maximum amount of users, LOTEO plans to provide additional payment options aside from Ethereum such as other cryptocurrencies or third party merchants that accept fiat currencies such as US Dollars or Euros. However, they will still require an Ethereum wallet as the lottery will be drawn from a pool containing the Ethereum addresses of all currently participating users.
infoSection.p5: Gaining additional LOTEU tokens raise a user’s chances of winning, but they do not increase the lottery pot. LOTEU tokens cannot be purchased, instead, users may gain them via air drops, bounty campaigns, contests and other LOTEO promotional efforts.

userAdvantagesSection.p1: Chances to win are much higher than in conventional lotteries because of our mechanism.
userAdvantagesSection.p2: Unlike conventional lotteries, where you need to tip the right combination of numbers and where the winner arises once a year, in LOTEO we have a winner every drawing.
userAdvantagesSection.p3: 75% , no other competitor has the same %
userAdvantagesSection.p4: By being governed by smart contracts rather than governments or private individuals, the drawing process becomes automated and trustworthy.
userAdvantagesSection.p5: Thanks to blockchain technology and using cryptocurrencies for lottery entry, LOTEO is 100% transparent and all transaction as well as prize splits can be viewed at all times, instead of traditional lotteries, where you {"don't"} know number of attendees, prize amount, nor even if its fair nor manipulated, as there is central authority.
userAdvantagesSection.p6: LOTEO feels a strong need to provide the best user experience, that our customer, especially non crypto familiar are used for, {"that's"} why there will be integration of credit card payments as well as mobile message payments.
userAdvantagesSection.p7: Thanks to blockchain technology and cryptocurrency usage Loteo is incomparably faster than traditional lotteries.
userAdvantagesSection.p8: Chances to win are much higher than in conventional lotteries.

investorAdvantagesSection.p1: There is no lottery, or another online gambling platform, that would implement token structure, like LOTEO did. Security token brings value for investors and rewards them in value 20% of each prize, that is splitted. As LOTEO cares about overall environment and its surrounding, there is a charity program, that brings percentage of each prize that takes place on LOTEO platform.
investorAdvantagesSection.l1: A unique chance to buy LOTES security tokens and become part of LOTEO, receiving ETH each time the lottery is drawn.
investorAdvantagesSection.l2: 20% of total prize pool are redistributed to the LOTES owners, based on how many LOTES each user has.
investorAdvantagesSection.l3: Governing rights to decision making (selection of charities, major changes in business model)
investorAdvantagesSection.l4: When the lottery becomes sustainable and successful, its total value grows and so will the value of LOTES

gameDetails.title: Loteo weekly lottery
gameDetails.text: The weekly LOTEO lottery will be executed through a smart contract on Ethereum that will utilize a true random number generator (RNG). The pool for drawing consists only of lottery tickets (based on the Ethereum addresses of the entrees) instead of drawing random numbers, therefore every drawing must have a winner. After the winner of the lottery is selected, a smart contract will send the prize automatically to the appropriate Ethereum address(es).

time.info:
It is recommended to use the ticket at least 30 min. before lottery drawing happens,
otherwise we are not able to guarantee participation in current week round.

rules.p1: Users enter the lottery by purchasing single tickets for the LOTEO weekly lottery using the Ethereum cryptocurrency, or through a third party merchant. Each Ethereum wallet address that has purchased entry is then registered as a participant in the LOTEO weekly lottery.
rules.p2: The LOTEO lottery will be executed through a smart contract that will utilize a random number generator (RNG).
rules.p3: The pool for drawing consists only of lottery tickets (based on the Ethereum addresses of the entrees) instead of drawing random numbers, therefore every drawing must have a winner.

chance.p1: Chances to win are much higher than in conventional lotteries because of our mechanism.

card.title: One-entry ticket
card.p1: Users enter the lottery by purchasing single ticket for the LOTEO weekly lottery using the Ethereum cryptocurrency, or through a third party merchant. Each Ethereum wallet address that has purchased entry is then registered as a participant in the LOTEO weekly lottery. At a later date, LOTEO will add a daily lottery governed by the same rules.
card.p2: The pool for drawing consists only of lottery tickets (based on the Ethereum addresses of the entrees) instead of drawing random numbers, therefore every drawing must have a winner.

card.title: LoteoPass
card.p1: You have the option of purchasing a year-long entry into the lottery, foregoing the need for repeated entries. For the first 1000 LOTEOPASS buyers, there will be a bonus. This will be a limited offer that will take place again after 1 year, when the first batch of LOTEOPASSes expires.
card.p2: The bonus consists of doubling your chance in each drawing of the lottery. This is achieved by using LOTEU. By purchasing the LOTEOPASS, the buyer gets an amount of LOTEU credited to his account that covers 52 weeks lottery entries.

card.title: LoteoMaxx
card.p1: You can buy lottery entries in higher amount – 10, 20, 50,100 with bonus lottery entries in the form of utility tokens. You can use this entries anytime in any amount.

charity.title:
Revolution
in giving
charity.text: Every time a user wins, 1% of total prize will be awarded to a charity
charity.p1: LOTEO aims to become profitable platform for its contributors while providing a generous lottery for its users. The people who created LOTEO believe that it is the duty of all profitable businesses to give a portion of the wealth back to charities, nonprofits and other organizations devoted to making the world a better place.
charity.p2: Innovation and technology may improve life for most of us, but it is important to not forget about those who are being left behind and are in need of some extra help.

coinback.title: Coinback program
coinback.text: Every ticket use in Weekly lottery will be rewarded thanks to LOTEO Coinback program. For each ticket used in the lottery, player will be rewarded with 10 LOTEU. Coinback is credited after 10 used tickets.

loteoTokens.p1: We have decided for the unique token structure, that brings a lot of advantages for investors as well as for all community members. Below you can see all the details to get familiar with both Loteo tokens.
loteoTokens.p2: LOTES is a security token which is meant to be sold only in private funding round (the STO). There will not be any public sale, for all investment requirements, please fill the form on the website. 100% from the platform profit will be distributed to LOTES holders, depending on how many tokens they hold in their wallet
loteoTokens.p3: The LOTES are locked for 15 months and during this time it is not possible to buy or sell them anywhere else. After the first 15 months pass, there will be another funding round during which LOTEO will sell at least 30% of all tokens in compliance with legal and regulatory requirements. All details will be revealed before this event. After selling these tokens, the token will be listed on exchanges enrighted for token trading.
loteoTokens.p4: After 15 months, maximum 20% of all security tokens will be owned by the lottery while at least 80% will be decentralized, preventing the lottery from being manipulated. The token also has a governing function, meaning any significant change has to be achieved by consensus and any token holder can issue a suggestion or voting.
loteoTokens.p5: LOTEU is utility token of Loteo, that enables to double your chance by lottery drawing. It doesn’t raise the prize, but it increases your ticket number in the pool. Already now there is a game with entry just in LOTEU - Moon of Fortune and if you are lucky enough, you can win an entry into regular lottery and possibly hit a jackpot.
loteoTokens.p6: By using of LOTEU at the game called FOMO you literally buy a chance not to loose, as you have one more chance during the game. And there will be more and more games coming soon. As there was no ICO for this token and huge part of it was airdropped for the community, there is no option to enter into main Weekly Lottery with LOTEU now. There is a plan to have also LOTEU as a payment option for the main games after the value of token is stabilized and not so volatile.
loteoTokens.p7: There is a quarterly burning event of this token as well. Loteo is burning 20% of all tokens received on the platform until the total supply of token is 100 000 000. Long term plan of the platform is to become B2B provider of its own solution for blockchain gaming & gambling and for anyone that wants to use this solution, there will be a condition to stake different amount of LOTEU tokens according to specified type of cooperation.

team.p0: The strongest and most valueable part of each project is in its members.  Our team is constantly growing, mostly located in Bratislava,Slovakia with members in Serbia, Russia, Chile, India... And maybe with you? Do not hesitate to reach us, we are hiring.
team.p1: Once there was a game, let´s call it a bee, in which ten employees used to invest 100 EUR from their salaries every month and drew a winner. The winner took it all – a prize of 1000 EUR. In the subsequent month that last winner again put in the usual amount, like the rest of the participants, but could not take part in the draw and therefore win. For that first winner the prize sum represented a kind of a loan without fees while for the future winners their monthly investments were simply savings for future. Hardly would have we – ordinary employees - been able to get or save such an amount of money under common circumstances.
team.p2: Ever since we were stung by the bee some years ago, we have had a strong driving force: develop a project that people can trust, enjoy and benefit from. Over time, the brilliant idea of a winner in every single draw along with a user-friendly environment has become our principal philosophy.

members.name: Rastislav Bakala
members.desc: Rastislav owns 3 successful companies that he built completely from scratch. He started his career in the financial sector, where he became a regional manager and then began work as a retail manager at a bank. After a successful start, he began working in the corporate sector and here he first began thinking about the big picture. Rastislav later set up his own company for blockchain technology and he built up his international business of selling and managing precious metals. But that was just the beginning. As just a 28 year-old, he has ambitions of helping the world through technologies like blockchain. He believes in a transparent and just world. Loteo brings the best of both worlds, combining the technological transparency of blockchain with the human desire to win money. His motto is that if you help other people get rich, you will help yourself!

members.name: Juraj Illes
members.desc: Juraj has many years of experience in business and marketing. During his studies at the faculty of management at Comenius University in Bratislava, he was head of marketing in a family-run business with high-end electronics. He then worked as an online marketing specialist at an international company that was the SMB partner of Google. As a businessman, he has driven his distribution company into the field of cosmetics and pharmacy. After the sale of his company, he began utilizing his acquired experience as a freelancer with a focus on marketing strategies. During this period he accepted an offer to serve as the marketing director company in FMCG area. His last brief stop was the management of the online department in one of the leading Slovak health insurance companies, but by that time he had already become interested in the world of cryptocurrencies and so he began to successfully manage business opportunities in this area, one of which is also the Loteo project.

members.name: Rene Darmos
members.desc: He earned a university degree in International Relations and Economic Diplomacy, to which he later added another in Economics and Management of International Business. He is an entrepreneur, crypto investor, ambassador, advisor, and occasionally a presenter of blockchain events. As an entrepreneur, he founded and built two companies that were successfully sold, and he is currently at the helm of another one. He is also involved in the organization of meetups and participates in several projects. He has been involved in the world of cryptocurrencies for a relatively short time (almost three years), but has nevertheless achieved significant results in this area and became an ambassador for Mainframe. Rene has met many influential and important people in the blockchain sector and thanks to his previous experience as brand manager for Red Bull and Unilever, combined with his business skills and customer-oriented thinking, he is an important member of the Loteo team, taking care of overall business development.

members.name: Jan Lalka
members.desc: Hope, faith in success and life experience. These are the things Jan has channeled into this business project. The concept has never been as obvious as it is today. He began his career as an entrepreneur as a 23 year old in 1997, gradually developing his business skills. In 2003, he returned to the global financial business and entered an industry where he helped develop four brands in 16 years and gradually moved from a sales position through business management to the head of an entire division. Although working for big brands has given Jan excellent experience, there is nothing more rewarding than the establishment and development of one’s own brand. This is the reason behind his commitment to the project. Energy, when channeled in the right direction, navigated with a long-term vision and held together by a belief in success, all but guarantees a successful result in business.

members.name: Nina Bakalova
members.desc: Nina received her college degree at the Economics University of Bratislava. At the same time she was also working on her modelling career, writing articles into various media and gained valuable experience in creating PR content and strategies. Her most recent job was the position of he head advisor for the Minister of Defense in the national council of the Slovak Republic.

members.name: Max Zakomoldin
members.desc: Cryptoinvestor, cryptotrader, analyst, fundraiser, financial market representative, reporting to the Central bank, public speaker. He specializes in cryptoeconomics, building token models and the natural price growth of tokens, based on the development of business. Max has given dozens of online and offline educational courses, which has led many people to discover the opportunity of earning a decent income via the internet.

members.name: Julius Buchel
members.desc: Content creator and the owner of a social media consultancy firm, blockchain enthusiast who focuses on cryptocurrency education, is experienced in networking , has more than ten years of experience in corporate finance as a CFO in various production fields, studied economy and law at university.

members.name: Robert Auxt
members.desc: Robert is the co-founder of ETERBASE. He served at the board level of the European Investment Bank, European Stability Mechanism and several other organizations with multibillion balance sheets. He studied at London School of Economics, University College London and University of Cambridge Judge Business School.

members.name: Peter Kris
members.desc: Peter is the founder of a blockchain dev studio and consultancy Block Unison, leading engineers to strong execution. Peter has a decade of experience in IT from the administration, through mobile, to backend development. A keen insider in blockchain industry since 2013 Bitcoin era, occasionally speaking on various topics and helping the local Ethereum community in Progressbar.

members.name: David Kokavec
members.desc: After graduating in law, the kryptotrejder project founder transformed his hobby and interest in cryptocurrency into a successful business aimed at educating people in this field. He has been providing a comprehensive financial consulting for both individuals and companies.  He enjoys helping people and seeing the results but what he loves most about his job is the personal progress and life-long learning. Apart from that, he is concerned with managing the biggest Slovak rap portal  and a lifestyle magazine. When he is not coming up with new business ideas and strategies, he devotes his time to family, travelling and sport. In Loteo he holds the position of an advisor.

members.name: Nenad Ristic
members.desc: Nenad has been drawn into the crypto waters in 2014, a Serbian that knows how to swim through the pump's and dump's with a smile on his face. A true believer in blockchain and all the advantages it brings to it's users. Nenad has over 4 years of experience in community management, creating brand awareness, and helping projects to hear the voice of their communities. He is also on the Advisory board of several projects in this groundbreaking industry. An optimistic and enthusiastic guy that will never turn his back to the community when a opportunity to teach arises, helping to get Blockchain closer to masses.

members.name: Sapta Munggaran
members.desc: Got into Bitcoin in the early 2013, Sapta is the ultimate Community Guy from Indonesia. He has helped and advised various Blockchain startups to create brand awareness, acquiring users, while also managing their community channels. He's also a volunteer moderator of the largest Bitcoin forum since 2014. He likes to educate people about cryptocurrency.

members.name: Anthony Sanchez
members.desc: Started his crypto journey doing tech support for a bitcoin ATM company, a Venezuelan with quite some luck, a brain and a dream. Working in the support industry for over 7 years, always up to any challenge you throw his way. His expertise being crisis management and de-escalation of issues be it on project specific groups or at large. Bitcoin being his passion, if you ever need to know anything about crypto in layman terms, you can ask him. Has over two years experience doing community management for a slew of different projects.

members.name: Husain Zabir
members.desc: Cryptocurrency Trader and Investor, Elliott wave analysts and researcher with 4 years of experience

downloads.p1: All important documents about the project, certifications, or other important topics on one place, for easier orientation. Still missing anything? Write us an a-mail and we will try to fulfill your needs.

faq.p1: All frequent questions on one place. In case there is still something unanswered, be sure to join our telegram channel where the answer comes immediately.

game.q: What is the price of LOTEO tickets?
game.a: The price of weekly lottery tickets is 10 EUR. A daily lottery is being prepared where the price of a single ticket will be 2 EUR.

game.q: What are the odds to win?
game.a: It can be calculated as the ratio between the number of my tickets and the total number of tickets in the pool.

game.q: How can I buy tickets online?
game.a: You need to open a free user account on our website to get to our dashboard where you can see the option to buy a ticket.

game.q: When do the lottery draws take place?
game.a: Draws of the main - weekly game - takes place once a week - every Sunday at 12.00 Central European Time. The time of the complementary lotteries draws will be announced on time before their launch.

game.q: How to check if I won?
game.a: There are various ways how you can check if you have won. 1. check your ETH balance in dashboard; 2. check the moon visitor down in dashboard; 3. visit LOTEO channel

game.q: What is the prize pool guarantee?
game.a: The volume of funds in the prize pool cannot be guaranteed since it is dependent exclusively on the number of tickets engaged in the particular game.

game.q: What is LOTEOPASS and what are its advantages?
game.a: LOTEOPASS is a means to buy a year-long entry in each weekly draw starting from the day of purchase. A LOTEOPASS owner is included in each draw automatically without the need to watch dates and times. The package of 52 tickets includes a bonus of 5 200 LOTEU tokens which are used automatically to double your chance to win.

game.q: What is LOTEOMAXX and what are its advantages
game.a: LOTEOMAXX is a package of tickets in various amounts – 10, 20, 50 or 100 pieces (tickets). The price of LOTEOMAXX package includes LOTEU tokens used to increase your chances to win. The owner can use the tickets with tokens according to his/her preferences in entries anytime in any amount, which increases the chance to win.

An affiliate partner is awarded for activities of a new user who registered in the platform via the partner´s affiliate link. The affiliate partner will receive a reward of 50 LOTEU tokens for an active account of a new user. Partners have the right to be rewarded with each sale of LOTEOPASS or LOTEOMAXX wholesale package, as well as they get 4% of each ticket value purchased by a new user registered in the first line under the affiliate partner.
A new user´s account is made active by a purchase and employment of any LOTEO product.

Space Program is aimed at the best affiliate partners. The bonus will be distributed to them according to the partners´ activity results. For this program LOTEO has created 1%, 2% and 3% pools out of all company´s LOTES tokens. Affiliate partners selling tickets will be rewarded with the appropriate pool commission percentage. LOTES tokens thus generate passive income for all participants in the three commission pools equally. The program is time limited with possible prolongation. For more info see the section Affiliate.

On the LOTEO platform launch day, the only possible way to pay for tickets is by ETH. In the near future a wide range of payment options will be available, starting with BTC, subsequently EUR using credit cards, bank transfer, mobile message payment (SMS) or others, such as ADV cash, PayPal etc.
Google authenticator is a safety feature to prevent your account against unauthorized login.

game.q: Is it possible to pass tickets?
game.a: Our platform enables to pass purchased tickets among registered participants.

game.q: What is a double chance and how to get it?
game.a: You can double your chance of winning the lottery without raising the price of a ticket. It can be done either when you use 100 LOTEU tickets for additional entry into the lottery or by a purchase of a year-ticket LOTEOPASS. Your ticket number is doubled in the pool and hence your odds to win are doubled.

legal.q: Where are the LOTEO headquarters located?
legal.a: LOTEO has established a parent company in Curacao in order to receive a global online gambling license with a subsidiary in Cyprus.

legal.q: Do I have to pay the tax?
legal.a: Each country has its own tax rules. In case of winning, any taxes in your country of residence is your responsibility.
It sure is. Thanks to the highly efficient TRNG – True Random Number Generator – the number generated is 100% random. You can see the TRNG certificate in the download section.
1% of total prize will be awarded to a charity.

legal.q: Countries and their residents forbidden to play on our platform
legal.a: Residents of the following countries: i) The United States of America and its territories; ii) Netherlands (including Curacao and other countries and territories that form part of the Kingdom of Netherlands); iii) Democratic People´s Republic of Korea; and any other country which may prohibit the offering online gambling to its residents or to any person within such a country. Internet gambling may be illegal in the jurisdiction in which you are located mainly but not exclusively Australia, Aruba, Bonaire, Curacao, Cyprus, France, Netherlands, Saba, Statia, St Martin, USA, or any other jurisdiction that the Central Government of Curacao (formerly the Netherlands Antilles) deems online gambling illegal.

crypto.q: What tokens are offered by LOTEO?
crypto.a: LOTEO emits two types of tokens – LOTES and LOTEU. Security token LOTES grants owners an opportunity to profit from the platform revenues. LOTEU is a utility token with ability to double your ticket number in the prize pool and hence double our chances of winning the lottery, however, it is also possible to use it for instant games on the LOTEO platform.

LOTES tokens are locked for 15 months after their purchase, during this time it is impossible to manipulate with them. Meanwhile, the launch of the LOTEO platform and its testing takes place. After the 15 months pass, the tokens will be unlocked and ready to use or sell.

crypto.q: How to profit from the lottery?
crypto.a: Purchasing and holding LOTES tokens means to profit from LOTEO platform. 20% of total platform revenue is distributed to LOTES token owners. This amount is instantly distributed by smart contracts to LOTES tokens owners according to their quantity.

crypto.q: How can I receive LOTES and LOTEU tokens?
crypto.a: LOTES tokens will be sold exclusively in private funding rounds. In the first round, taking place from March 1st 2019 to April 30th 2019, 50 millions of tokens will be available for price 0,05 EUR per a ticket. In the second round, starting August 1st 2020 and ending September 9th 2020 or while stock lasts, 30 millions of LOTES tokens will be sold for 0,10 EUR per token. LOTEU tokens can be acquired in airdrops, affiliate program, in community competitions as well as on the stock market.
Each ETH or metamask wallet owner can enter the game without the need to register on our platform.

crypto.q: Where can I see smart contracts?
crypto.a: Smart contracts can be tracked on both GitHub and Etherscan.

content.title: Hello moonvisitor!
content.p:
Congratulations for succesfull participation in our Tutorial Airdrop and helping us grow!
You will receive your LOTEU directly on the platform after the end of the whole airdrop.
Be sure to follow our Social Medias and join Telegram Group so you have all important informations at first hand.
You can multiply your LOTEU by playing our first instant game Moon Of Fortune. And btw, you can win there also a ticket into weekly lottery.

Have a great day and thank you for joining Loteo mission to the moon.

text.part2: Explainer: Participation in lottery requires a transaction on-chain on Ethereum network. Every on-chain transaction requires a fee, in our case 0.017 ETH. This is because we want to ensure every participation is transparent and visible directly on Ethereum network. We are working very hard to make this fee as low as possible.

boarding.title: Welcome to Loteo
boarding.text: Loteo is the first true on-chain lottery based on Ethereum blockchain. If you want to take part in any of our games, you have to have Ethereum available in your wallet. The games fees are various, ranging from 0.017 to 0.051 Eth. Do you fancy the FIRST DEPOSIT BONUS? Send 1 Eth and you will receive 3000 LOTEU.

dashboard.text1: You sure want to set up some great avatar or customize your profile....Everything shows up after pressing this Profile button.
dashboard.text2: This is the wallet panel. Your balances are shown here as well as the amount of your purchased tickets
dashboard.text3: If this place shows you zero, you should load your wallet in case you want to join the lottery.
text4: See your actual balance of LOTEU, a utility token that doubles your chance to win in the draw. More info can be found
. LOTEU can be obtained as a reward or bought on exchages soon. Find how to get LOTEU easily
text5: After investing in LOTEO, you should soon see the relevant amount here. What are the advantages of becoming an investor besides getting 20% of each drawn prize amount? Click
dashboard.text6: Just like in e-shop, choose the products that suit you best and below you can see your summary. By pressing the buy button you will be asked to choose the payment option.
dashboard.text7: Enter the lottery by clicking this button. Make sure you have enough funds to be able to enter the lottery...You are always asked to confirm your decision.
dashboard.text8: By clicking here you can enter your wallet and carry out the operations you wish.
dashboard.text9: This is the opened wallet interface. On the left side under Tickets entered the lottery you can check if you succesfully entered the lottery after purchasing tickets. It is always good to check!
dashboard.text10: When you click the button, you will find your adress, QR code and all needed information.
text11: All information about the current week lottery in one place. Although the platform runs on Ethereum, the prize amount is in EUR, the exchange rate is updated every 5 minutes. The prize is shown also in BTC and ETH. To check the contract, click
to spot your current winning odds, check the last winner and see the next draw date and time.
text12: Just like a skipass, or any other pass, we offer the whole-year pass with the bonus of double chance to win for the whole year long! More info can be found in this
. If you want to become PREMIUM PARTNER, this is a must.
text13: If you prefer to play in larger amounts, this is the thing for you. We certainly offer bonuses if you purchase more tickets... You can use them anytime you wish. Check it out
text14: This is your chance to win the jackpot without purchasing any tickets. This awesome game where you can use your LOTEU from airdrops is starting soon. You can multiply your tokens or win tickets for the weekly lottery. How cool is to have a chance to win a lottery without the need of spending your funds? More info about Moon of Fortune will be released soon on our blog. Check
text15: If you have a network or just some friends who might be interested in Loteo platform, this is your chance to earn. Help us grow and you will be rewarded. All info about the most generous affiliate program in the universe can be found in
dashboard.text16: The last lottery results can be found here... You can even check them on etherscan, which is one of many advantages compared to regular lotteries.
dashboard.text17: We believe you will have a lot of fun on our platform. We are generous in rewarding those who help us grow. Spread your affiliate link and earn LOTEU. Thank you for attending our tutorial, give us your feedback and should there be any questions, ask our admins in telegram. Enjoy the video and remember the winner!
